resources.string: Use this feature to set the default arrange by for your book list
Use this feature to show only books with a certain rating.
Use this feature to show only books with a particular status.
Non-case sensitive search for books containing the entered text as part of its title.
Non-case sensitive search for books containing the entered text as part the author\'s name.

If you receive the message "Ivalid Scan" you will have to manually enter the ISBN number.
ISBN numbers can be found in multiple places:
Look in the white box for the ISBN - the ISBN number is listed to the right.
Sometimes the ISBN is written below the bar - it is usually a 9 or 10 digit number.
The ISBN can always be found on the inside of the book on the copyright page.
